summary: Stand up comedian/magician, The Amazing Johnathan, comes to the stage and Comedy Central in this one-hour, stand-up special. Check out Jonathan while he shows the audience that convincing magic is harder than it looks.
cast: The Amazing Johnathan|Kristy Clark|Erica Jones|Chris Ritter|Erica Vanlee|Penny Wiggins|Vinnie Paul
title: Amazing Johnathan: Wrong on Every Level
